bibl.title: Settlements of the Ptolemies. City Foundations and New Settlement in the Hellenistic World.
bibl.note: Introduction. - I. Dynastic Toponyms. - II. Ptolemaic Foundations as Regional Systems. - III. Ptolemaic Foundations as 'Urban' Systems. - IV. Colonising Egypt and the Eastern Mediterranean. - Conclusion. - Appendices. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: MUELLER Katja, Settlements of the Ptolemies. City Foundations and New Settlement in the Hellenistic World. (Studia Hellenistica. 43.)
Leuven - Paris - Dudley, Mass., Peeters, 2006, 8°, xvii-249 pp., 16 tabl., 9 figg., 8 cartes. ISBN 90-429-1709-1. €59.

Introduction. - I. Dynastic Toponyms. - II. Ptolemaic Foundations as Regional Systems. - III. Ptolemaic Foundations as 'Urban' Systems. - IV. Colonising Egypt and the Eastern Mediterranean. - Conclusion. - Appendices. Bibliography.

C.R. par Günther Poethke, ArchPF 52 (2006) pp. 256-258. - Sara Saba, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2007/2007-07-27.html >. - Laurens E. Tacoma, BibO 65 (2008) coll. 653-656. - Camille Thorens, MusHelv 65 (2008) pp. 245-246. - Giovanni Ruffini, Topoi 15 (2007) pp. 673-686.
